name: Seasonal Rotting
description:
Made for the Rotting Pixels Game Jam.

Sprites by Rotting Pixels.

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Getting it Done" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Sound effects created by my voice.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Move using arrow keys or A and D. Jump using up, W or Spacebar. Reset Levels by pressing R or waiting a second.
